rupiyal pahe muddara alewiya 50% kin pahatha watila priyadarshana liyanage thapal katayuthu sandaha bhawitha karana rupiyal pahe warshika muddara alewiya miliyana ate sita miliyana hathara (8-4) dakwa 50% pramanayakin pahatha wati athayi thapal departhamenthu abhyanthara aaranchi marga sandahan karayi. 2007, 2008, 2009 wasara wana wita samanya thapal katayuthu sandaha bhawitha karana rupiyal pahe thapal muddara miliyana hathak atak (7-8) athara pramanayak wasarakata alewi wu athara ema pramanaya me wana wita miliyana hatharak pahak dakwa aduwi thibe.
